'''Alpha v1.0.16''' is a version of [[Java Edition Alpha]] released along with [[Alpha server 0.1.1|server 0.1.1]] on August 12, 2010, that made [[commands]] usable again in servers.

== Additions ==
=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Commands]]'''
* {{cmd|/banlist}}
** Displays the server's blacklist.
* {{cmd|/home}}
** Teleports a player to the world spawn.
* {{cmd|/pardon}}
** Removes entries from the banlist.
* {{cmd|/pardon-ip}}
** Specifies the IP address to remove from the banlist.
* Re-added {{cmd|/op}}, {{cmd|/deop}}, {{cmd|/kick}}, and {{cmd|/ban}}.

'''[[Multiplayer]]'''
* Added server operators, which can send server commands by typing a slash followed by a server command. Server operators can also build and destroy blocks near the spawn area.

=== General ===
'''[[Splash]]'''
* Added new splashes:
** Menger sponge!
** idspispopd!
** Eple (original edit)!
** So fresh, so clean!

== Changes ==
=== General ===
* Support for more records.
